Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Dermatitis \Der`ma*ti"tis\, n. [NL., fr. Gr. de`rma, -atos, skin + -itis.] (Med.) Inflammation of the skin. [1913 Webster]
dermatitis n : inflammation of the skin; skin becomes itchy and may develop blisters
